creditline: Gift of David Laird and Helen Lauritzen Laird
description: abstracted image; standing elderly woman with white hair and long white earrings, wearing a stylized blanket of multicolors shading into each other--white, pink, orange, green, blue, purple; owl perched on a round element (shield?) with three feathers--two are white a black, one is silver and black, with spots of black and white extending from feather tips; grey shaded background
marks: Signature, Title, Date, Edition and Stamp bottom center, in pencil: [Seabourn \'81]; LRC, in
title: Medicine Spirit
